/** * AbstractTool. * * @author Werner Randelshofer * @version 5.0 2007-11-05 Changed superclass from Object to AbstractBean. *
4.0 2007-04-29 Replaced code in method keyPressed by an InputMap * and a ActionMap. *

2.0 2006-01-14 Changed to support double precision coordinates. *
